      Nexustentialism
      2015 Pop-Culture Highlights
      January 2, 2016 by Miranda Velasquez

      Fellow Gauchos, 2015 is officially over. Can you believe it!? Even though it seems to have lasted all of five minutes, so much has happened in the world of celebrities, TV, movies, music and strange yet interesting Internet fads. Let’s take a look back on all the crazy, funny, awesome, slightly disturbing and downright entertaining moments that defined 2015.

      January:

      via tumblr.com

      1. The year-long hit show “Empire” airs for the first time.

      February:

      via imgur.com

      2. #leftshark – Katy Perry’s left shark at the Superbowl becomes an internet meme.
      3. The blue and black versus gold and white dress debate debuts. Is it blue or is it gold?
      4. Tyga & Kylie Jenner’s relationship goes public.
      5. #OscarsSoWhite – A trending hashtag goes viral on Twitter regarding the results of the Academy Awards.

      April:

      via zone.tmz.com

      6. Hit the Quan 
      7. Deez Nuts. Got ’em.
      8. The Kylie Jenner Lip Challenge

      May:

      via micdotcom.tumbr.com

      9.Kylie addresses the sudden growth of her lips, although she had already been getting injections for some time.
      10. The Charlie Charlie Challenge

      June:

      via huffingtonpost.com

      11. The #blacklivesmatter movement gains traction on and off social media.
      12. “What are thooooooose!?”
      13. Fetty Wap comes out with back-to-back chart-toppers.
      14. Donald Trump begins his campaign for president.
      15. Caitlyn Jenner makes her appearance on the cover of Vanity Fair.
      16. Gay marriage becomes legal in all 50 states. Love finally wins.
      17. The Pixar animated film, “Inside Out”, tugs at the heartstrings of children and adults alike!

      July:

      via buzzfeed.com

      18. Drake versus Meek Mill beef. Is that a world tour or ya girls tour?
      19. The “Don’t Judge Me” Challenge

      August:

      via cosmopolitan.com

      20. The whip/nae nae sweeps the globe.
      21. “Straight Outta Compton” hits theaters.

      September:

      via imgur.com

      22.Who can forget about everyone’s favorite pastime, Netflix and chill?
      23. Snapchat releases new filters that sync with your face.
      24. Why the fuck you lyin? Mmm ohmygod.
      25. Future and Drake’s What a Time To Be Alive mixtape drops.
      26. Pizza rat dominates YouTube.

      October:

      via twoten9.com

      27. “Hotline Bling” takes over the internet and the radio. While the track was released at the end of July, the video didn’t hit the world until October. Regardless, 2015 was Drake’s year.
      28.  Adele makes a comeback with “Hello”.
      29.  Lamar Odom almost dies.

      November:

      via rebloggy.com

      30. The Acapella app videos
      31. DJ Khaled’s words of wisdom help snapchat through hard times. Thank you, DJ Khaled. #Blessup
      32. Justin Bieber gives us something to “Beliebe” in again with his new album.
      33. More recent, but still taking the internet by storm: the “Dab”
      34. Peanut Butter Baby. Ah.
      35. The Condom Challenge
      36. Kobe Bryant announces he will retire from basketball after this season.

      December:

      via theverge.com

      37.  The new Star Wars movie hits theaters and is a huge success.

       

      We’re ready for you, 2016! Happy New Year from all of us at Nexustentialism!

          The Signs as Summer Desserts


          • Aries
            March 21 - April 19
            Yerba mate chocolate truffles
          • Taurus
            April 20 - May 20
            triple chocolate cake
          • Gemini
            May 21 - June 20
            Fireball pumpkin pie
          • Cancer
            June 21 - July 22
            Bucket of ice water
          • Leo
            July 23 - August 22
            S'mores
          • Virgo
            August 23 - September 22
            Vodka mocha bundt cake
          • Libra
            September 23 - October 22
            Chocolate-covered almonds
          • Scorpio
            October 23 - November 21
            Frozen yogurt with Hot Cheeto topping
          • Sagittarius
            November 22 - December 21
            Jar of mayonnaise
          • Capricorn
            December 22 - January 19
            Rum cake
          • Aquarius
            January 20 - February 18
            Oatmeal raisin cookies
          • Pisces
            February 19 - March 20
            Raspberry cheesecake
